name: LinkButton
desc: The component for opening a link in a button.

items.name: URL
items.desc: The URL to open when a user interacts with the range of text specified in the addition.

items.name: accessibilityLabel
items.desc: A string that is read to the user when certain accessibility functionalities are enabled.

items.name: anchor
items.desc: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

items.name: animation
items.desc: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.To remove a previously set condition, use none.

items.name: behavior
items.desc: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.To remove a previously set condition, use none.

items.name: conditional
items.desc: An instance or array of button properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

items.name: hidden
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: A unique identifier for this component. If used, identifier must be unique across the entire document. An identifier is required if you want to anchor other components to this component.

items.name: layout
items.desc: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout that is defined at the top level of the document.If layout is not defined, size and position are based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

items.name: style
items.desc: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle that is defined at the top level of the document.The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

items.name: text
items.desc: The text, styled according to the textStyle definition.

items.name: textStyle
items.desc: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
